I've been waiting a while to write this, but I'm finally gonna do it. 

This is my review of Portal 2 
======================

Let's start off by saying how good this game actually is and for the price it's set at. The storyline follows you and the main protagonist. The story Portal takes place an indeterminate amount of time, somewhere between 50 and 50,000 years, after the events of Portal, which saw Chell destroying the sentient computer GLaDOS, and landing outside the facility, only to be dragged back inside of Aperture Science where she was ultimately placed in a Relaxation Chamber by Doug Rattmann for the indefinite future.

After considerable time has passed, Wheatley, a personality core, that has helped to maintain Aperture Science during the absence of GLaDOS arrives at the room of the awakening Chell. With a desire to flee the crumbling facility, Wheatley and Chell begin their quest to escape Aperture Science to return to the real world. After separating from Wheatley and completing a series of tests revisited from Portal, Chell reunites with Wheatley and head to what they believe will escape.

However this isn't the case. - I won't spoil too much on the story for you. If you haven't already played it. 

======================

The Pros of Portal 2 
======================

- Good storyline 

- Good Puzzle game 

- Has an amazing co-op 

- Potato GLaDOS

- Outstanding music 

- Easy controls (Good for beginners into puzzle games) 

- Good price (I recommend you buy it) 

- Can be played multiple times because of how good and entertaining the story is 
 
- Challenging Puzzles 

- Good comedic effects and sound affects

- Wheatley (Before he becomes insane)

======================

The Cons of Portal 2 
======================

- The Robots!! 

- Wheatley (When he's insane) 

- Old game (Doesn't mean much, just means it's not played a lot now by newer players)
=======================

Overall I give Portal 2 a 9 out of 10, just because of these cons. I'd love to see a Portal 3 in the future.

çok güzel oyun

Herkese merhabalar, bugün elimden geldiğince size Portal 2'nin ne kadar güzel bir oyun olduğunu anlatmaya çalışacağım.

Oyunu açıklayacak olursak: Portal 2, adından da anlayabileceğiniz üzere portallar açıp bölümleri geçmeye çalıştığınız bir bulmaca oyunu, oyunun tek ve çift oyunculu olarak 2 şekilde oynayabilirsiniz. (Çiftten kastım eşli çevrimiçi oyun)

Oyunun burada artısını eksisini yazayım diye düşündüm ama eksisi yok, tek artısı da kusursuz olması. Bir arkadaşınızla birlikte indirimi bekleyin, alın ve oynayın. Pişman olmayacağınızın garantisini veriyorum. Şakasız söylüyorum hayatımda ki en verimli, en eğlenceli 18 saatti bu oyunu oynamak. Düşünün, en kötü ne olabilir ki? İade edersiniz ve ortalama bir gün içinde paranız geri sizde olur. Sadece alın, indirin ve oynayın! İnanın bana pişman olmayacaksınız.

Levei 10 horas para zerar, 10 horas bem gastas, basicamente o jogo de quebra-cabeças mais famoso da Steam, e o melhor também, consiste em um jogo onde você deve colocar 2 portais, como o nome bem diz, você pode se teleportar de um para o outro, assim, você deve resolver os "chambers" que seriam basicamente "fases", porém em certos momentos, você acaba tendo que sair da área de testes, e isso se da com o desenrolar do jogo.

Em comparação ao primeiro jogo, diversos problemas de jogabilidade foram consertados, e também o jogo ganhou sua própria estética, fazendo com que os menus deixassem de parecer como se você estivesse jogando um mod de Half-Life, também posso dizer que os gráficos do jogo estão no mínimo 3x melhores que o primeiro jogo.

É recomendado jogar a primeira versão do jogo, Portal, para ter um contexto dos acontecimentos que então vem em Portal 2, porém se você quiser apenas jogar pela sua gameplay, Portal 2 é mais recomendado.

Sobre o modo coop, ainda não terminei de joga-lo, porém o mesmo tem sua própria "mini-história" e os personagens dos jogadores também, no caso vocês são robôs passando por testes técnicos (de Glados).

Se o jogo roda ou não, é importante analisar as especificações final da página da loja, mas para se basear, meu computador é um notebook, 4GB ram i5 (no caso notebooks não tem placa de vídeo, a não ser que você tenha comprado um com placa de vídeo).

Puzzle: 10/10 Superior ao jogo anterior, já que Portal 2 tem maior duração.
Lore: 9/10 Superior ao jogo anterior.
Bugs: 8/10 Você pode encontrar alguns bugs, um que encontrei é quando jogo com um amigo coop, enquanto jogo conectado no Discord, começo a ouvir vozes duplicadas, e sou obrigado a desligar o som do jogo.

Não comprei em promoções, nem recebi de graça.

хотя эта игра не блешет отличным графоном (я имею виду в даный момент) она пистрит отличным юмором , сюжетом , геимплеям . и веть эта игра гововаломка что не вызывает доверия но просто поверте они смагли сделать самую интересную игру по моему скромному мнению . если вы думаите покупть ее то берите это оличная игра а по акции буквално за 30 р это шедевор надеюсь камуто помог просто поверте мне это одна из самых лудших игр даже сейчас .

If you haven't played Portal 2 or Portal then you clearly are new to pc gaming or gaming in general (unless you played the orange box that was released for consoles). This game is by far one of the best single player experiences I have had. As well as having an excellent story, there is a co-op mode that takes you on an adventure through many different and varied levels. 

I cannot recommend this game enough however playing it a second time may seem boring for some.

Em 2020, 6 anos depois de jogar pela primeira vez, Portal 2 continua superando as expectativas.

What a fantastic game.  I vaguely recall dismissing this (and its predecessor) when it came out as I'm not a massive fan of puzzle games, but I saw it on sale and bought it on a whim quite a while ago, and finally gave it a go the other day.  I'm really glad I did.  A really interesting puzzle game with a nice sci-fi setting.  Fantastic voice acting - Stephen Merchant is a particular highlight, and perfect for the role he plays.  I may even investigate portal 1 at some point.   Villamonky rates this as 17 and a half pangolins.

Up to this day it holds up to be a fun, challenging puzzle-game with a nice story to go along with it.
Despite being pretty old, it's graphics don't look old (except for the theme, obviously) or out-dated.
It's good puzzles are fun for the original veterans, and people new to the Portal series.
Also, the community-made maps are brilliant, personally, I'd recommend the "12 Angry Tests" series.
To top it all of, there are practically full games built off of this,
There's Portal Stories: Mel, a journey through old Aperture where the first models of the Portal Gun are built.
(Not to mention it's completely free for Portal 2 buyers)
Also, another notable one, is Aperture Tag, where you use the gels from the base game, packed neatly into it's own gun, to get around test chambers. This one, though, costs 4.99$, but it's definitely worth it!

Что ж.. Вот и подошли мои 16 часов нахождения в этой замечательной игре! Когда я играл в нее, меня нечего не волновало, был только я и портал. Эта игра подарила мне кучу ярких эмоций. Она просто шедевральна! Сюжет данной игры - это как книга, которую вы читали не отрываясь, книга чьи листы вы перелистывали один за другим. Музыка, даже сказал бы - мелодия этой игры будет сниться вам во всех позитивных снах. А какие там карты, уровни, они все проделаны руками мастеров. Эти громандные размеры, эта обстановка, когда всё давным давно было забыто людьми. Ну просто шедевр. Как говорил сам Гейб Ньюелл: Эта самая лучшая игра за всю историю VALVe! И я чертовски с ним согласен. Пройдите эту игру, уверяю вас, вы не разочаруетесь. Шедевр, просто шедевр!

This game is stunning masterpiece. Not only does it improve an already great franchise by adding more puzzle elements and a more engaging solo story, but it also adds multiplayer, with its own unique story as well. It has a fantastic narrative, improved visuals and the puzzles are not extremely hard but still challenging. As a bonus, you can now make and play other players test chambers, using most of the elements in game. So what are you waiting for? Grab your portal gun and bring a buddy to play to fantastic game!!!
